assetProfile.address2: 8th Floor No. 35, Anding Road Chaoyang District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Beijing Trust&Far Technology CO.,LTD provides data center information technology (IT) operation and maintenance services. The company offers IT infrastructure services, including hardware support and maintenance services; and software support and maintenance services comprising database, middleware, and backup management systems. It also provides IT service solutions that comprise one-stop service, heterogeneous platform maintenance, hardware maintenance service, software support and operation service, customizable value-added, and data migration solutions; and IT professional services, which include IT system consulting, equipment and system software upgrade, equipment relocation, application data migration, equipment leasing, single technical support, and IT technology training services. In addition, the company offers system integration products and services comprising equipment and system software, project management and implementation, and after-sales support and maintenance for hardware devices that include minicomputers, PC servers, storage, networks, etc., as well as system software comprising databases, middleware, backup software, and others; and IT master plan, host system integration, storage system and network system integration, storage consolidation and virtualization, data centralized backup, and data center disaster recovery solutions. Beijing Trust&Far Technology CO.,LTD was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Jingying  Lin
companyOfficers.title: Director, Deputy GM & Sec. to the Board
